channel.title: [HELP] Adapting to Java
channel.description:
[center][size=21pt]New to MoparScape![/size][/center] [hr] [center]Introduction[/center]
Alright, hello everyone I am going to save us all some time by saying that I am not new to [i]RuneScape Private Servers[/i] just outdated. I am new to the language of [i]Java[/i] though. I practiced it on 317 Delta's and All-star a few years back and got pretty good. I moved to PI and it seemed the same just a bit more to it, so I didn't stay long before I skipped to 508+. I am not here to be a [u]leecher[/u] by no means, I want to learn more about [i]RSPS's[/i] and [i]The Java Language[/i]. [hr] [center]On Point Purpose[/center]
I am coming to you, to ask you a favor; if any of you out there could point me into the path of a nice RSPS Base server. Good to start off of, to start a project with and possibly to host online for others to enjoy just as much as I enjoyed making it. As the introduction says, I went to PI... but I never truly stuck with it to learn its potential, if any. I was thinking about going back, if you guys think it's worth it to make a project out of it. If not, that is perfectly fine, I just may need someone's guidance though [url=http://'SwiftTic' is my skype]Skype[/url] maybe. [hr] [center]What I Plan to Have For Final Production[/center]
[center]I plan to have; *A fully updated and working gameframe with MoneyPouch/PriceCheck, Summoning, Experience, Worldmap, Hitpoints, Prayer, Run, Logout, and a customized Staff Button. *All Tabs working perfectly without lag or duplication, and a custom 'member' tab. *All skills working 100% including Summoning(BoB at least), Hunter, and Dungeoneering with a custom 'Trust' skill. *A custom quest tab with my own custom WELL DEVELOPED quests. <-- This is my strong point. *A more in depth Settings Interface/Fully working Report Abuse System/Call Staff Interface. *Clan Chat fully working with Kicking/Banning/Auto Join. *718 Graphic's if possible, with all the new items & stats. *Fully working Grand Exchange/Banking/Trading/Lending/Request Assistance. *Custom PkP Exchange, Vote Exchange, Loyalty Points, and Server Points. *All Mini-games including Clan Wars, Warrior's Guild, Duel Arena, Bounty Hunter, Soul Wars, 63 Waves of Jad, Pest Control, Fishing Trawler, Agility games, Custom Slayer games and my custom mini-game(after a year of planning). *Perfect Combat with NPC's and Players. (No idea how to edit combat.) *All Bosses 100% with cut-sceens if possible including; Nex, Godwars, Corporal Beast, and all others I am not familiar with. *Developing a stable economy, (I am familiar with how economy's works so this is not a problem.) *Fully working lobby if possible. *Fully working Auras, maybe compatible with adding custom items like Halo's. *All area's and NPC's spawned and look-a-like's to RuneScape. *Right Click Report option. *Custom fight option, as if you were to get into a fight in real life. *Fully working Random Events to stop all botters/afk players.
*UPDATED WHEN THOUGHT OF MORE*
I am not asking to leech this stuff by no means, I have a lot more than this to do to a server. But if there is a good source out there with stuff like this, that would be amazing. (If given a PI, I would like a base and then a fully loaded PI source to check out some stuff and apply it.)[/center]
[center][size=18pt]Thanks so much to all of those who decide to help, please forgive me if I came across demanding.[/size][/center]

item.title: [HELP] Adapting to Java
item.dc:creator: @Swiftic Swiftic
item.description:
@Swiftic wrote:

Thanks for all the pointers guys, but to make sure I get the right one… a good one. Can you guys link them please?

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Adapting to Java
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Apollo or Hyperion, Azzure (based on runesource) is okay too I guess.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Adapting to Java
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Actually you should try checking one of them out. Or Comet by iz3

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Adapting to Java
item.dc:creator: @Swiftic Swiftic
item.description:
@Swiftic wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:539152”]you aren’t gonna get far by using project insanity, delta, or any other winterlove

use pheonix or asteria, both of which can be found in the downloads section[/quote]That’s why I asked for whatever you guys think would be best for me.
SideNote: I looked up both, found your post on Asteria, looks a bit deceiving but I might check it out. Pheonix was a 500+ and had no pictures or information.
Thanks for helping me out though.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Adapting to Java
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

you aren’t gonna get far by using project insanity, delta, or any other winterlove

use pheonix or asteria, both of which can be found in the downloads section

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Adapting to Java
item.dc:creator: @Swiftic Swiftic
item.description:
@Swiftic wrote:

[center][size=21pt]New to MoparScape![/size][/center]
[hr]
[center]Introduction[/center]

 Alright, hello everyone I am going to save us all some time by saying that I am not new to [i]RuneScape Private Servers[/i] just outdated. I am new to the language of [i]Java[/i] though. I practiced it on 317 Delta's and All-star a few years back and got pretty good. I moved to PI and it seemed the same just a bit more to it, so I didn't stay long before I skipped to 508+. I am not here to be a [u]leecher[/u] by no means, I want to learn more about [i]RSPS's[/i] and [i]The Java Language[/i].

[hr]
[center]On Point Purpose[/center]

Good to start off of, to start a project with and possibly to host online for others to enjoy just as much as I enjoyed making it. As the introduction says, I went to PI... but I never truly stuck with it to learn its potential, if any. I was thinking about going back, if you guys think it's worth it to make a project out of it. [center]I plan to have;
*A fully updated and working gameframe with MoneyPouch/PriceCheck, Summoning, Experience, Worldmap, Hitpoints, Prayer, Run, Logout, and a customized Staff Button.
*All Tabs working perfectly without lag or duplication, and a custom ‘member’ tab.

*A custom quest tab with my own custom WELL DEVELOPED quests. <-- This is my strong point.

*All Bosses 100% with cut-sceens if possible including; Nex, Godwars, Corporal Beast, and all others I am not familiar with.
*Developing a stable economy, (I am familiar with how economy’s works so this is not a problem.)
*Fully working lobby if possible.
*Fully working Auras, maybe compatible with adding custom items like Halo’s.
*All area’s and NPC’s spawned and look-a-like’s to RuneScape.
*Right Click Report option.
*Custom fight option, as if you were to get into a fight in real life.
*Fully working Random Events to stop all botters/afk players.

UPDATED WHEN THOUGHT OF MORE

I am not asking to leech this stuff by no means, I have a lot more than this to do to a server. But if there is a good source out there with stuff like this, that would be amazing. (If given a PI, I would like a base and then a fully loaded PI source to check out some stuff and apply it.)[/center]

[center][size=18pt]Thanks so much to all of those who decide to help, please forgive me if I came across demanding.[/size][/center]
